message.body: Remembered the books. See ya later
Aw so sweet. Thanks. See you later.
Hey Monica. Slow afternoon for me today. Would it be ok if I took off early and caught up w u another time? I will leave books here in trader joe bag for u
Of course! I'm 6 blocks away on trolley but no need to wait.
Oh. Argh. I left about 10 minutes ago I was thinking you wouldn't be there till 730-ish
Is your break next week or week after?
Week after
If you are in town we can shoot for a rendezvous Lunch drink whatever
Yes! That would be fun! I like drinking at lunch actually.
The idiots guide to ethics...really! I am appalled. (No surprise there.)
Yeah that book IS appalling...and in some ways the class is too.
Hmmm how do I swing lunch drinking and an afternoon shift? ;)
Oh funny! I totally wasn't thinking of that!! No to alcohol at lunch then! Do you want to pencil in lunch on Thursday the 2nd?

Ed might be mad. I am leaving for Maine to study with my teacher for a week and will miss 2 weeks of class! I'm going to an island in the middle of a lake to study IDs. Do you want to come? No electricity, no running water, camping. I think you would love
They got a new Chinese teacher. Have you met Pierce Salguero? He studies this history of Chinese medicine at penn state Abbington.
I WOULD like that island setting!! Have gone to one of perce's lectures. The old Chinese teacher was extremely patient but don't think she liked how poorly the won communicated w her.
I think eds class is only 5 weeks so u should chat w him.
Ok have u down for lunch on 2nd. In west Philly. Ill let u pick place
Looking forward to it. Good luck w finals!!
Yes I will definitely chat with him. Missing two weeks is not ideal but I know most people will miss at least one. I will do extra work if I need to.
I already have picked the place! Haha!
Have you been to Atiya Ola at 45 and Baltimore? It's mostly vegan raw and really yummy. Or Ethiopian. Or Indian are good too. :)
Lunch will be fun!!!
Haven't been there - I'm open to all of them. Yes F U N
